cards.rules_text:
[+1]: Mill three cards, then put a creature card from among them into your hand.

cards.rules_text:
Trample
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to an opponent, proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn:
• Tap up to one target nonland permanent.
• Create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token.
• Draw a card, then discard a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Cultural exchange between Ulnia and Sen Yaneta benefits both parties.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may draw a card and put an emptiness counter on Trendy Spirituality.
Your maximum hand size is reduced by 1 for each emptiness counter on Trendy Spirituality.

Flying
Whenever Gracious Host attacks, draw a card. If there are three or more card types among permanents you control, you gain 2 life. If there are five or more, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Her guest list is equal parts impressive and alarming.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{T}: Scry 1. Put a contact counter on Public Phoneline.
{5}, {T}: Draw a card. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each contact counter on Public Phoneline.
cards.flavor_text: [i]A city of a million missed connections.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Garden Fountain enters, surveil 1, then draw a card.
{1}{U}, Sacrifice Garden Fountain: Surveil 1, then create a tapped Treasure token.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“What's the point of being rich if you don't flaunt it?”
—Ryan Opal[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
Ignition {2}{R} [i]({2}{R}: Return this from the graveyard to the battlefield as a Vehicle artifact with crew 3. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
Haste

Haste
Players can't gain life.
Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Her favorite song doubles as a battlecry.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Menace
[i]Sabotage[/i] — Whenever you cast a spell that targets an opponent or permanent an opponent controls, put a +1/+1 counter on Tagging Aficionado.

Haste
Whenever a Vehicle you control enters, it gains haste and becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each card type among cards in your graveyard.
Lighting Lanterns deals 6 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Sen Yaneta celebrates festivals from all across the world as people remember their old homes.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. 
Create a Treasure token.
​
cards.special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. 
Create a Treasure token.

cards.rules_text:
Enchant basic land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, add one mana of any color it didn't produce.

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Desert you control.
When this enters, choose one—
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• Gain 4 life.
Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a Souvenir token. [i](It's an artifact with “When a creature deals damage to an opponent, you may sacrifice this to put a +1/+1 counter on it.”)[/i]
Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

Northside Ghost can't block.
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, return Northside Ghost from your graveyard to your hand.

When Oni Shoplifter enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
When Oni Shoplifter dies, create a Treasure token.
cards.flavor_text: [i]With most “respectable” routes to success closed off for them, Sen Yaneta's demons tend to pursue other avenues.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Target opponent reveals their hand. Choose a nonland card revealed this way. That player discards that card.
Ignition {B} [i]({B}: Return this from the graveyard to the battlefield as a Vehicle artifact with crew 3. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
